title: WAF Context Result Schema
description: Map containing the result of a context evaluation cycle

keep.description: Whether the data contained herein must override any transport sampling through the relevant mechanism

events.description: Generated events during the evaluation cycle

actions.description: Generated actions during the evaluation cycle

attributes.description: Derived objects generated by processors or obtained from rule attributes

timeout.description: whether there has been a timeout during the evaluation cycle

duration.description: The total runtime of the evaluation cycle in nanoseconds
